system.description:
Riding is used to determine the ability to ride/control a steed in combat. The skill may also be used for other difficult mounted maneuvers at GM discretion. The skill is opened at SBx1 on the first attempt to mount a steed, generally a horse.

The relationship between rider and steed is significant. Riding EML is always averaged with STEED INITIATIVE. That means, effectively, that a separate Riding skill exists for each steed.
